title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 501.5 - Penalties/enforcement actions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 501.5 - Penalties/enforcement actions

State Regulations

All Regulated Entities shall be subject to all applicable
penalties, including late fees and interest, provided for by the BL, the FSL, the State Finance law or other applicable laws. Enforcement act ions for
nonpayment could include suspension, revocation, termination or other
actions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
501.5

Amended

New

York State Register February 20, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 07, eff. 1/31/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
